text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Viljandi County | settlement_type = County of Estonia |image_skyline=Helkivad ööpilved Kuresoo kohal.jpg | image_flag = Viljandimaa_lipp.svg | flag_size = 125px | image_shield = Viljandimaa vapp.svg | shield_size = 75px | image_map = Viljandi County in Estonia.svg | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Estonia | seat_type = Capital | seat = Viljandi | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | area_total_km2 = 3422.49 | population_total = 48,101 | population_as_of = Jan 2017 |population_rank = | population_density_km2 = auto | registration_plate = D | iso_code = EE-84 | website = | footnotes = }} Viljandi County is a county in Estonia. The capital city is also named Viljandi. Soomaa National Park is a national park partly in the county. == Municipalities == The county is divided into municipalities. There is one urban municipality and three rural municipalities in Viljandi County. Rank Municipality Type Population (2018) Area km2 Density 1 Mulgi Parish Rural 7,652 881 8.7 2 Põhja-Sakala Parish Rural 8,203 1,153 7.1 3 Viljandi Parish Rural 13,950 1,374 10.2 4 Viljandi Urban 17,758 15 1,183.9 ==References== Category:Counties of Estonia
